attributes.action: Stop shamed MP's hanging on until the next election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Shamed MP's are standing down, but not until the next election because that way they will receive a whopping golden handshake. They should be made to leave now, and not get rewarded for doing wrong. This sets a terrible example for the nations' youth. They should be made to go now.

rejection.details: Government does not control who sits in Parliament. This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament: http://www.parliament.uk/ or the relevant political party(ies).
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
